messages.title: YOUR CHOICE, YOUR FUTURE!
messages.content:
On 8 June, choose the kind of future you want for you, your family and our country. Every vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote for:
- Fully-costed plans for investment in the NHS, schools and social care.
- Help for small businesses, and fighting the hard Brexit that hurts jobs and services.
- Building the homes that London needs and introducing new rent-to-buy schemes.
- Protecting the environment, cleaning up air pollution and keeping our streets safe.
- Funding aid and defence properly to play a responsible role in a changing world.
Only the Liberal Democrats are offering the positive choice we deserve.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Investment in the NHS, Schools and Social Care
